OCC.DAT:
variables string FIELDNAME numeric DIS(-ZZZZZ9PZZZZZZ) SMM_FORMAT string STRBEHAVIOUR ; Form type emulated string STRENTITY ; Entity valrep string STRENTNAME ; Entity name string STRLOCKED ; Locked foreign string STRMODE ; Form mode string STRPARAM ; Misc parameters string STRPOS ; From position in the tab string UTL_CONTEXT1 string UTL_CONTEXT2 string UTL_DBNAVLIST ; See constant string UTL_DETCPTMOD ; See constant string UTL_DETCPTNMOD ; See constant string UTL_DETMODE ; Entity detail mode boolean UTL_DISCONNECTED string UTL_DLUPENTLST ; See constant string UTL_DTD string UTL_MNUDISABLE ; See constant string UTL_OPTIONLIST ; See constant string UTL_PENDACT ; Pending action string UTL_ROENTLST ; See constant string UTL_SSV string UTL_TPL ; See constant string UTL_TPLVER ; See constant string UTL_WRUPENTLST ; See constant endvariables #define BreakInheritance_cpt_GENERAL #Comment start_of_mappings #ifdefined UENTITY #info symbol UENTITY is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UENTITY=SPRD0100.SMM #Comment
#ifdefined UNQ_UENTITY #info symbol UNQ_UENTITY is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UNQ_UENTITY=SPRD0100 #Comment
#Comment end_of_mappings
#ifdefined UTL_ROENTLST #info symbol UTL_ROENTLST is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UTL_ROENTLST= #Comment List of readonly entities
#ifdefined UTL_WRUPENTLST #info symbol UTL_WRUPENTLST is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UTL_WRUPENTLST= #Comment List of Write-up entities
#ifdefined UTL_DLUPENTLST #info symbol UTL_DLUPENTLST is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UTL_DLUPENTLST= #Comment List of Del-up entities
#ifdefined UTL_DETMODE #info symbol UTL_DETMODE is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UTL_DETMODE= #Comment Entity detail mode
#ifdefined UTL_DETCPTMOD #info symbol UTL_DETCPTMOD is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UTL_DETCPTMOD= #Comment List of detail components
#ifdefined UTL_DETCPTNMOD #info symbol UTL_DETCPTNMOD is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UTL_DETCPTNMOD= #Comment List of detail components
#ifdefined UTL_OPTIONLIST #info symbol UTL_OPTIONLIST is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UTL_OPTIONLIST=DISPLAY #Comment List of options
#ifdefined UTL_MNUDISABLE #info symbol UTL_MNUDISABLE is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UTL_MNUDISABLE=CLEAR&uSEP;RETRIEVE&uSEP;STORE&uSEP;ERASE #Comment Disabled menu options
#ifdefined UTL_DBNAVLIST #info symbol UTL_DBNAVLIST is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UTL_DBNAVLIST= #Comment Db navigator valrep
#ifdefined UTL_TPLVER #info symbol UTL_TPLVER is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UTL_TPLVER=1.00 #Comment <RESERVED>
#ifdefined UTL_TPL #info symbol UTL_TPL is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UTL_TPL=UTL_FORM_TPX #Comment <RESERVED>
#ifdefined UTL_CTELIST #info symbol UTL_CTELIST is already or also defined as a global or local constant #endif #define UTL_CTELIST=UTL_TPL,UTL_MNUDISABLE,UTL_TPLVER,UTL_DBNAVLIST,UTL_DETCPTMOD,UTL_DETCPTNMOD,UTL_ROENTLST&uSEP;UTL_OPTIONLIST,UTL_DETMODE,UTL_WRUPENTLST,UTL_DLUPENTLST #Comment <RESERVED>

operation exec ;AUTHOR : Georges Moiny, Compuware Montreal ;DESC : ;CREATED: 20/05/1999 ;============================= MOD HISTORY ============================== ;TAG DATE DESCRIPTION ;MOD.3 991030 Only do the retrieve on the first page ;MOD.2 990905 Add a clear statement to support multiple "EDIT" calls ;MOD.1 990904 Add "EDITMULT" mode form Tree-Tab widget form support ;======================================================================== params string $strEntity$ :INOUT string $strEntname$ :INOUT string $strMode$ :IN string $strParam$ :INOUT string $strPos$ :IN endparams variables string strTemp string xmlData,pError,pErrorContext endvariables call LP_BEFEXEC getitem/id $strbehaviour$,$utl_optionlist$,"BEHAVIOUR" if($strMode$="EDIT"|$strMode$="DISPLAY") if($strbehaviour$="TUX") clear if($strEntity$!="") getlistitems/occ $strEntity$,$strEntname$ endif retrieve else ; if($strEntity$!="") ;MOD.3 if($strEntity$!="" & ($strPos$=1 | $utl_disconnected$)) ;MOD.3 clear ;MOD.2 getlistitems/occ $strEntity$,$strEntname$ ; SMM_CR00089 Start ; $ult_disconnected$, $utl_ssv$ and $utl_dtd$ should be set in LP_BEFEXEC if($utl_disconnected$) xmlsave xmlData,"DTD:%%$utl_dtd$%%%" activate/stateless "%%$utl_ssv$%%%".load(xmlData,pError,pErrorContext,strTemp) if(pError>0) ;pJMb001 message/error p_errorContext message/error pErrorContext ;pJMb001 else clear clrmess putmess "%%$componentname%%% disconnected mode" putmess xmlData xmlload xmlData,"DTD:%%$utl_dtd$%%%" release endif $strMode$="DISPLAY" ; SMM_CR00089 End else retrieve endif ; endif endif elseif ($strMode$="SHOW") else if($strPos$=1) call X_EXEMNXTPX("<UENTITY>") endif call LP_BEFEDIT getitem/id strTemp,$utl_optionlist$,"DISPLAYONLY" if($status>0|$strMode$="DISPLAY") display else edit endif call LP_AFTEDIT call LP_AFTEXEC done
entry X_FORMATDIM if($utl_tpl$="UTL_FORM_RPX") putitem/id $fieldproperties,"FORMAT","DIM" return endif if($componenttype!="S" & $$smm_imperial & $format!="") $smm_format$=$format/<INCH_TO_MM>*$$smm_precision $smm_format$=$smm_format$[trunc] $smm_format$=$smm_format$/$$smm_precision $format="%%$smm_format$%%%" endif end
entry X_DEFORMATDIM variables numeric numTemp endvariables if($componenttype!="S" & $$smm_imperial & $format!="") numTemp=$format*<INCH_TO_MM> $format="%%numTemp%%%" endif end
entry LP_SETCORRECTION params string strFieldname :IN endparams variables numeric numValue,numOldValue endvariables
if(strFieldname="P0LL") strFieldname="P0L" if(strFieldname="P0LR") strFieldname="P0L" strFieldname="C%%strFieldname%%%" numValue=@$fieldname getitem/id numOldValue,$fieldproperties(strFieldname),"OLD" if(numValue=numOldValue) @strFieldname="" fieldvideo strFieldname else @strFieldname=numValue fieldvideo strFieldname, "COL=63" endif slcalc.SPRD0100=p0lr.SPRD0100+p0ll.SPRD0100+p1l.SPRD0100+p2l.sprd0100+p3l.SPRD0100+p4l.SPRD0100 swcalc.SPRD0100=bfs.SPRD0100+tfs.SPRD0100+ph.SPRD0100 bob_tfs.SPRD0100=tfs.SPRD0100+cslot1.SPRD0100 bob_bfs.SPRD0100=bfs.SPRD0100+cslot2.SPRD0100 bob_ph.SPRD0100=ph.SPRD0100-cslot1.SPRD0100-cslot2.SPRD0100 end
entry LP_SETCORRECTION_N params string strFieldname :IN endparams variables numeric numValue,numOldValue endvariables bob_tfs.SPRD0100=tfs.SPRD0100+cslot1.SPRD0100 bob_bfs.SPRD0100=bfs.SPRD0100+cslot2.SPRD0100 bob_ph.SPRD0100=ph.SPRD0100-cslot1.SPRD0100-cslot2.SPRD0100 end
entry LP_BEFEXEC done
entry LP_AFTEXEC done
entry LP_BEFEDIT done
entry LP_AFTEDIT done
entry LP_BEFINIT done
entry LP_AFTINIT done
entry LP_BEFCLEANUP done
entry LP_AFTCLEANUP done
entry LP_BEFCLR done
entry LP_AFTCLR done
entry LP_BEFSTOR done
entry LP_AFTSTOR done
entry LP_BEFRETR done
entry LP_AFTRETR done
entry LP_BEFACPT done
entry LP_AFTACPT done
entry LP_BEFQUIT done
entry LP_AFTQUIT done
entry LP_BEFMNUS done
entry LP_AFTMNUS done
entry LP_BEFPRNT done
entry LP_AFTPRNT done
entry LP_BEFPULS done
entry LP_AFTPULS done
entry LP_BEFASYS done
entry LP_AFTASYS done
entry LP_BEFFRGF done
entry LP_AFTFRGF done
entry LP_BEFFRLF done
entry LP_AFTFRLF done
entry LP_BEFRETS done
entry LP_AFTRETS done
entry LP_BEFERAS done
entry LP_AFTERAS done
entry LP_BEFUKYS done
entry LP_AFTUKYS done
operation BEFLOCK call SMM_CADAR done end
operation STARTELEMENT params string Name: in string Attributes: in endparams variables string strField,strEntity endvariables $1=$split(name,1,".",strField,strEntity) if(strEntity="sprd0105") $fieldname$=name endif end; STARTELEMENT
operation ENDELEMENT params string Name: in endparams variables string strField,strEntity endvariables $1=$split(name,1,".",strField,strEntity) if(strEntity="sprd0105") $fieldname$="" endif end; ENDELEMENT operation
operation CHARACTERS params string Chars: in endparams variables string strFieldname,strCorrFieldname endvariables if($fieldname$<>"") @$fieldname$=chars strFieldname=$replace($fieldname$,1,"sprd0105","sprd0100",-1) strCorrFieldName="C%%strFieldname%%%" if($fieldname$="p0l.sprd0105") if(dessin.sprd0100="1" | dessin.sprd0100="2") strFieldname=$replace(strFieldname,1,"p0l","p0lr") fieldsyntax "p0ll.sprd0100","HID" fieldsyntax "p0lr.sprd0100","" elseif(dessin.sprd0100="3" | dessin.sprd0100="4") strFieldname=$replace(strFieldname,1,"p0l","p0ll") fieldsyntax "p0lr.sprd0100","HID" fieldsyntax "p0ll.sprd0100","" endif endif @strFieldname=chars if($fieldname$<>"slcalc.sprd0105" & $fieldname$<>"swcalc.sprd0105" & $fieldname$<>"closuretype.sprd0105") if(@strCorrFieldname<>"") @strFieldname=@strCorrFieldname putitem/id $fieldproperties(strFieldname),"OLD",chars endif endif end; CHARACTERS operation
Operation AFTREAD variables handle myHandle handle myViewer any result string strTmp,ownco,ownbr endvariables if($entname="SPRD0100") fieldsyntax "p0lr.sprd0100","" fieldsyntax "p0ll.sprd0100","" fieldsyntax "p1l.sprd0100","" fieldsyntax "p2l.sprd0100","" fieldsyntax "p3l.sprd0100","" fieldsyntax "p4l.sprd0100","" fieldsyntax "bfs.sprd0100","" fieldsyntax "ph.sprd0100","" fieldsyntax "tfs.sprd0100","" ;pJMb001 activate "GENERATESPECS".SpecXML($1,tkproduct,"") activate "GENERATESPECS".SpecXML ($1, tkproduct.SPRD0100, "") ;pJMb001 newinstance "UXMLREADER",myHandle if($procerror) message/nobeep $procerrorcontext else myHandle->SetHandler($instancehandle()) myHandle->Parse($1,"F") endif myViewer = $ocxhandle(image.SPRD0100) if($procerror) message/nobeep $procerrorcontext else call SMM_GETSPECFILE(strTmp) putmess strTmp if($fileexists(strTmp)) myViewer->Set_ReportName(strTmp) if($procerror) message/error("Set_ReportName(%%"%%strTemp%%%%%") : erreur %%$procerror%%%") myViewer->SetView("Fit") if($procerror) message/error("SetView(%%"Fit%%") : erreur %%$procerror%%%") myViewer->Scrollbars(0) if($procerror) message/error("Scrollbars(0): erreur %%$procerror%%%") myViewer->Toolbar(0) if($procerror) message/error("Toolbar(0) : erreur %%$procerror%%%") myViewer->SetPageMode("None") if($procerror) message/error("SetPageMode(%%"None%%") : erreur %%$procerror%%%") myViewer->View() if($procerror) message/error("View() : erreur %%$procerror") else ownco=cadowncompany.SPRD0100 ownbr=cadownbranch.SPRD0100 activate "SMM_GNRLTOOL".GetDefault(ownco,ownbr,"CADPATH",strTmp) if(strTmp!='&uALL;^\') strTmp="%%strTmp%%%\" myViewer->Set_ReportName("%%strTmp%%%blank.pdf") if($procerror) message/error("Set_ReportName(%%"%%strTmp%%%blank.pdf%%") : erreur %%$procerror%%%") myViewer->SetView("Fit") if($procerror) message/error("SetView(%%"Fit%%") : erreur %%$procerror%%%") myViewer->Scrollbars(0) if($procerror) message/error("Scrollbars(0): erreur %%$procerror%%%") myViewer->Toolbar(0) if($procerror) message/error("Toolbar(0) : erreur %%$procerror%%%") myViewer->SetPageMode("None") if($procerror) message/error("SetPageMode(%%"None%%") : erreur %%$procerror%%%") myViewer->View() if($procerror) message/error("View() : erreur %%$procerror")
; myViewer->LoadFile(result,"%%strTmp%%%blank.pdf") ; myViewer->SetView("Fit") ; myViewer->SetShowToolbar(0) ; myViewer->SetPageMode("none") ; myViewer->SetShowScrollbars(0)
endif endif slcalc.SPRD0100=p0lr.SPRD0100+p0ll.SPRD0100+p1l.SPRD0100+p2l.sprd0100+p3l.SPRD0100+p4l.SPRD0100 swcalc.SPRD0100=bfs.SPRD0100+tfs.SPRD0100+ph.SPRD0100 endif End ; Operation AFTREAD
operation Y_PAGECLR params string $strMode$ :IN endparams variables handle myViewer any result string strTmp,ownco,ownbr endvariables clear myViewer = $ocxhandle(image.SPRD0100) if($procerror) message/nobeep $procerrorcontext else ownco=cadowncompany.SPRD0100 ownbr=cadownbranch.SPRD0100 activate "SMM_GNRLTOOL".GetDefault(ownco,ownbr,"CADPATH",strTmp) if(strTmp!='&uALL;^\') strTmp="%%strTmp%%%\" myViewer->LoadFile(result,"%%strTmp%%%blank.pdf") myViewer->SetView("Fit") myViewer->SetShowToolbar(0) myViewer->SetPageMode("none") myViewer->SetShowScrollbars(0) endif end
;pJMb001 START NEW CODE Operation EXEREAD if ($entname == "SPRD0105") ;NO read on non database entity SPRD0105 and NO future read via include proc SPRD0105_LPM $result = -1 endif end ;Operation EXEREAD ;pJMb001 END NEW CODE

trigger detail cp0l.SPRD0100="" cp1l.SPRD0100="" cp2l.SPRD0100="" cp3l.SPRD0100="" cp4l.SPRD0100="" ctfs.SPRD0100="" cbfs.SPRD0100="" cph.SPRD0100="" bob_tfs.SPRD0100="" bob_bfs.SPRD0100="" bob_ph.SPRD0100="" cslot1.SPRD0100="" cslot2.SPRD0100="" activate $instancename.AFTREAD()

trigger error call X_ONERRORFLD
trigger formatToDisplay call X_FORMATDIM
trigger formatFromDisplay call X_DEFORMATDIM
trigger next call X_NEXTFIELD
trigger previous call X_PREVFIELD
trigger getFocus call X_FLDGF
trigger valueChanged call LP_SETCORRECTION($fieldname)

; start triggers for OCX AcroPDF.PDF
trigger OnMessage params endparams
end ; trigger OnMessage
trigger OnError params endparams
end ; trigger OnError
; end triggers for OCX AcroPDF.PDF

trigger detail variables numeric numTk, numRequest string strOrdCmd endvariables
if ($$acr_userid!="PIERREMND" & $$acr_userid!="MLJMROUTHIER" & $$acr_userid!="NATHC") return
numTk=tkproduct.sprd0100 strOrdCmd=b_action.SPRD0100 activate "SMM_SPRO1110_001".Create(numTk,strOrdCmd,numRequest)

trigger loseFocus call X_NEXTFIELD
